name: Tech Innovators Summit 2025
description: Join the brightest minds in tech for a day of talks, networking, and hands-on demos.

name: Jazz in the Park
description: Enjoy a relaxing evening of live jazz performances under the stars.

name: Startup Pitch Night
description: Watch early-stage startups pitch their ideas to a panel of investors and mentors.

name: Urban Art Walk
description: Explore city streets transformed into open-air galleries featuring local artists.

name: Food Truck Fiesta
description: Taste dishes from top food trucks, enjoy music, and hang out with fellow foodies.

name: Mountain Hiking Challenge
description: Push your limits on a scenic group hike through the Rockies.

name: Photography Masterclass
description: Learn lighting, composition, and storytelling from a professional photographer.

name: Indie Film Festival
description: A celebration of independent cinema featuring premieres, Q&As, and workshops.
